name: Load Parquet flex template
description: Dataflow flex template for loading parquet files to BigQuery

parameters.name: input-file
parameters.label: Input file.
parameters.helpText: The file path for the input text to process.

parameters.name: output-table
parameters.label: BigQuery output table name.
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery output table name.

parameters.name: output-schema
parameters.label: BigQuery output table schema.
parameters.helpText: Path to BigQuery output table schema file.
